data.text: @jburnmurdoch @jo_liss And millions who were susceptible died.

@jburnmurdoch How would someone go about creating a very primitive chart like this for other countries? I understand the ONS methodology and can't replicate that elsewhere which is why I said primitive. Can non-ONS case and death data kind of somewhat replicate this for the UK?
@Antonio_Caramia @Alicia_Smith19 @jburnmurdoch She's a senior scientist at moderna🤦‍♂️ it's you that's not paying attention to real data.

@jburnmurdoch Aşı %11 azalttığına dair konuda İstatistik uzmanı analizinde diyor ki;
Korelasyon yok !
Yani Aşısız/Aşısız fark yok
Siz neye göre azalmayı aşılamaya bağladınız ki? 
Omicron ile sınırlandı zaten virüs 2 yıl zarfında sönümleniyor...
Buraya ekleyim
Siz de ekleyin
Science; it's good!

@jburnmurdoch Interested to see if there is any data on whether these cases of 'treated with Covid' (not 'for Covid') represent elevated hospital admissions for same period in previous years - i.e. whether Covid inflammatory response is triggering or exacerbating other conditions...
@jburnmurdoch Porque eso en Argentina no se vio así. Acá falleció menos gente. Y aumento con la coincidencia del inicio de la Inoculación Experimental.

@KarlRobinson02 @simplymiatx23 @jburnmurdoch @benshapiro I agree. That's why when my car breaks down, I go to a plumber and when I need a lawyer, I ask an accountant to represent me.

What do experts know anyway?!
